scripts.docker:storybook:dev: pnpm run docker:storybook:build && pnpm run docker:storybook:run
scripts.cloud:build: gcloud builds submit . --config apps/storybook/cloudbuild.yaml --substitutions=_VITE_WEB_COMPONENT_URL="$(grep VITE_WEB_COMPONENT_URL apps/storybook/.env | cut -d '=' -f2)"
scripts.cloud:tag: DIGEST=$(gcloud container images describe gcr.io/adventure-kiwi/storybook-app --format='get(image_summary.digest)') && gcloud container images add-tag gcr.io/adventure-kiwi/storybook-app@$DIGEST gcr.io/adventure-kiwi/storybook-app:latest
scripts.cloud:deploy: gcloud run deploy storybook-service --image gcr.io/adventure-kiwi/storybook-app --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.cloud:deploy:all: pnpm run cloud:build && pnpm run cloud:tag && pnpm run cloud:deploy
